languages.text: "Ваши слуги желают знать ваше мнение по двум вопросам, касающимся организации церемоний. Первый — какими торжественными мероприятиями в столице вам будет угодно сопроводить этот славный день?"

traits.locale_text: "Ваши слуги желают знать ваше мнение по двум вопросам, касающимся организации церемоний. Первый — какими торжественными мероприятиями в столице вам будет угодно сопроводить этот славный день?"

languages.text: "Your servants wish to know your opinion on two matters related to the ceremony arrangements. The first of which is — what festive activities are to take place in the capital on this glorious day?"
languages.original_text: "Ваши слуги желают знать ваше мнение по двум вопросам, касающимся организации церемоний. Первый — какими торжественными мероприятиями в столице вам будет угодно сопроводить этот славный день?"

traits.locale_text: "You servants wish to know your opinion on three matters related to the ceremony arrangements. The first of which is — what festive activities are to take place in the capital on this glorious day?"
"You servants wish to know your opinion on three matters related to the ceremony arrangements. The first of which is — what festive activities are to take place in the capital on this glorious day?"
"Your servants wish to know your opinion on three matters related to the ceremony arrangements. The first of which is — what festive activities are to take place in the capital on this glorious day?"
"Your servants wish to know your opinion on three matters related to the ceremony arrangements. The first of which is — what festive activities are to take place in the capital on this glorious day?"
"Your servants wish to know your opinion on two matters related to the ceremony arrangements. The first of which is — what festive activities are to take place in the capital on this glorious day?"

languages.text: 「式典の手配に関するふたつの課題について、従者が陛下のご意見を求めています。ひとつは、この記念すべき日に首都で行う祝祭の催し物を何にするかということです」
languages.original_text: "Your servants wish to know your opinion on two matters related to the ceremony arrangements. The first of which is — what festive activities are to take place in the capital on this glorious day?"

traits.locale_text: 「式典の手配に関するふたつの課題について、従者が陛下のご意見を求めています。ひとつは、この記念すべき日に首都で行う祝祭の催し物を何にするかということです」

languages.text: “您的仆人想要知道，典礼上有两件事情您打算如何安排。第一件事——庆典当日，您希望在首都举行什么样的活动？”
languages.original_text: "Your servants wish to know your opinion on two matters related to the ceremony arrangements. The first of which is — what festive activities are to take place in the capital on this glorious day?"

traits.locale_text: “您的仆人想要知道，典礼上有两件事情您打算如何安排。第一件事——庆典当日，您希望在首都举行什么样的活动？”

languages.text: «Sus sirvientes quieren saber su opinión en cuanto a dos asuntos relacionados con la organización de la ceremonia. En primer lugar: ¿con qué clase de actividades quiere que festeje la capital este glorioso día?».
languages.original_text: "Your servants wish to know your opinion on two matters related to the ceremony arrangements. The first of which is — what festive activities are to take place in the capital on this glorious day?"

traits.locale_text: «Sus sirvientes quieren saber su opinión en cuanto a dos asuntos relacionados con la organización de la ceremonia. En primer lugar: ¿con qué clase de actividades quiere que festeje la capital este glorioso día?».

languages.text: « Vos serviteurs souhaiteraient avoir votre avis sur deux aspects de la cérémonie. Pour commencer, quelles festivités aimeriez-vous que l'on organise dans la capitale en ce jour glorieux ? »
languages.original_text: "Your servants wish to know your opinion on two matters related to the ceremony arrangements. The first of which is — what festive activities are to take place in the capital on this glorious day?"

traits.locale_text: « Vos serviteurs souhaiteraient avoir votre avis sur deux aspects de la cérémonie. Pour commencer, quelles festivités aimeriez-vous que l'on organise dans la capitale en ce jour glorieux ? »

languages.text: "Eure Diener würden gerne noch Eure Meinung zu zwei Dingen bezüglich der Vorbereitungen der Zeremonie erfahren. Zum einen: Welche festlichen Aktivitäten sollen an diesem glorreichen Tag in der Hauptstadt stattfinden?"
languages.original_text: "Your servants wish to know your opinion on two matters related to the ceremony arrangements. The first of which is — what festive activities are to take place in the capital on this glorious day?"

traits.locale_text: "Eure Diener würden gerne noch Eure Meinung zu zwei Dingen bezüglich der Vorbereitungen der Zeremonie erfahren. Zum einen: Welche festlichen Aktivitäten sollen an diesem glorreichen Tag in der Hauptstadt stattfinden?"

languages.text: "Hizmetkârlarınız, merasim düzenlemeleriyle ilgili iki konuda fikrinizi öğrenmek istiyor. İlki, bu görkemli günde başkentte hangi etkinliklerin yapılacağı."
languages.original_text: "Your servants wish to know your opinion on two matters related to the ceremony arrangements. The first of which is — what festive activities are to take place in the capital on this glorious day?"

traits.locale_text: "Hizmetkârlarınız, merasim düzenlemeleriyle ilgili iki konuda fikrinizi öğrenmek istiyor. İlki, bu görkemli günde başkentte hangi etkinliklerin yapılacağı."
